channel.title: Name that...
channel.description:
Put a name to specific concepts, ideas, or emotions that have no name yet. Try to make it interesting.
Example - musical extrapolation: the experience of listening to a song you have never heard and predicting the next notes, or the next possible notes, which may or may not be better fitting than the existing notes.
If you are wondering if something has a name or not, ask it here.
If you know of obscure or strange words like that which are already defined, you can share those too.

item.title: Name that...
item.dc:creator: Comrade_Tiki
item.description:
Medevilae:

I need a word for

(adj.) Trying to be like everyone else, sometimes struggling in doing it, ending up looking like an idiot in the end; cliche, shallow.

atikian

Greek etymology.
The phenomenon of this happening is atikia.
To be (or become) atikian is to atikiate.

By the way, did you know:

[INDENT]There’s a word for the process of construction accomplished by many smaller parts improvising according to simple rules based on indicators left during a previous stage. This is the kind of engineering used when building an ant colony, termite mound, or bee hive.

The word is stigmergy.[/INDENT]

Read full topic

oh wait

item.title: Name that...
item.dc:creator: sersoft
item.description:
nietzschesaurus:

nnnnhhhgggg… i’m pretty sure setting puppy dogs on fire and being a parasite to everybody who’s ever known you out of sheer indifference to other living beings, and an overwrought sense of personal accomplishment even though you’re a complete waste of space is the definition for antisocial disorder.

Welp, that’s me in a nutshell.

fucking hypocrites…

Read full topic

Read full topic

item.title: Name that...
item.dc:creator: nietzschesaurus
item.description:
nnnnhhhgggg… i’m pretty sure setting puppy dogs on fire and being a parasite to everybody who’s ever known you out of sheer indifference to other living beings, and an overwrought sense of personal accomplishment even though you’re a complete waste of space is the definition for antisocial disorder.

ooh, i got it, medevilae. a phony. A BIG FAT PHONY. wannabe? hipster? i don’t know. there aren’t many words that express ideas like that except slang. there are a couple of nouns/verbs of similar concepts, but i’m sure it wouldn’t be hard to make those into adjectives.

attitudinizer, mountebank, charlatan… i got nothin after that.

Read full topic

item.title: Name that...
item.dc:creator: sersoft
item.description:
Medevilae:

I need a word for

(adj.) Trying to be like everyone else, sometimes struggling in doing it, ending up looking like an idiot in the end; cliche, shallow.

When people say things like that I always think they are talking about me, then I remember that theres a difference between posing and not giving a flying fuck

and the term for that is antisocial disorder I think

Read full topic
